text: Skazhi [, Mukhammad,] nevernym, chto yesli oni vozderzhatsya ot [sovrashcheniya veruyushchikh s puti Allakha], to im budut proshcheny ikh proshlyye grekhi. Yesli zhe oni vnov' obratyatsya [k vrazhde s muslimami], to ved' uzhe v davniye vremena [za podobnyye deyaniya] byli nakazany drevniye pokoleniya
